heading: HR01944
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE STATUS OF THE RECONSTRUCTION PLANS, RELIEF, AND REHABILITATION EFFORTS FOR MARAWI CITY, INCLUDING A REVIEW OF THE UTILIZATION OF ALL DISBURSED FUNDS FOR SUCH EFFORTS AND THE EXAMINATION OF THE PRESCRIBED GUIDELINES USED IN THE SELECTION OF PRIVATE CONTRACTORS THAT WILL LEAD THE REHABILITATION EFFORTS IN MARAWI CITY, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING THAT THE GOVERNMENT, THROUGH THE TASK FORCE BANGON MARAWI, WILL BE ABLE TO DELIVER ON ITS COMMITMENT TO PRIORITIZE  THE POST-DISASTER RECOVERY OF MARAWI CITY THROUGH EFFICIENT, EFFECTIVE, AND TRANSPARENT MEANS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01944
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE STATUS OF THE RECONSTRUCTION PLANS, RELIEF, AND REHABILITATION EFFORTS FOR MARAWI CITY, INCLUDING A REVIEW OF THE UTILIZATION OF ALL DISBURSED FUNDS FOR SUCH EFFORTS AND THE EXAMINATION OF THE PRESCRIBED GUIDELINES USED IN THE SELECTION OF PRIVATE CONTRACTORS THAT WILL LEAD THE REHABILITATION EFFORTS IN MARAWI CITY, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING THAT THE GOVERNMENT, THROUGH THE TASK FORCE BANGON MARAWI, WILL BE ABLE TO DELIVER ON ITS COMMITMENT TO PRIORITIZE THE POST-DISASTER RECOVERY OF MARAWI CITY THROUGH EFFICIENT, EFFECTIVE, AND TRANSPARENT MEANS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-31
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-07-30
